001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a class as an <b>Entity</b> in the domain model.
007 *
008 * <p>
009 * An Entity represents a domain concept that has a distinct
010 * <b>identity</b> which persists through state changes and across time.
011 * Its equality is typically based on its identifier rather than its
012 * attributes.
013 * </p>
014 *
015 * <h3>Characteristics:</h3>
016 * <ul>
017 *   <li>Has a unique identifier (e.g., {@code id}).</li>
018 *   <li>Identity remains constant, even as attributes change.</li>
019 *   <li>Lifecycle is tracked (created, updated, deleted).</li>
020 *   <li>Encapsulates domain state and rules relevant to its lifecycle.</li>
021 * </ul>
022 */
023@Documented
024@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.DOMAIN_LANGUAGE)
025@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
026@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
027public @interface Entity {
028}
